Text: It hangs and crashes on WD Media Player and on a PC using VLC about 5 min into it.

I love this fucking band.  1st Rock group I ever got to listen to by tricking my parents into buying me a 2XL "Educational" Toy Robot that played 8 track tapes - and then I went to garage sales and searched out old 8 Tracks and 2112 is the 1st one I found.  Thanks for the up but you guys should go buy it too... the extra bonus disk has some really awesome stuff on it.

I love them too. Soooo much. I'm only 22 and pretty much got into em cause they're my dad's favorite band. I bought a concert ticket a few years ago for their R30 tour and he did too and we went together. Love them and always will. And just played it on the new guitar hero for the first time. Well, sang it lol. They actually have the band, and Gene Simmons narrate the parts of 2112. It was so awesome.
Why in fuck do you need 4.37 GiB to upload this? I aint touchin' this. Plus I heard the up aint wurf a chit.

To Erich505 :
VIDEO CODEC..... 4339K
AUDIO CODEC..... 1536K

Worth watching, worth listening.

The file works fine on all of my PCs and when burned to DVD.
